mdragon::CompositePolicy

CompositePolicy Class Template Reference

CompositePolicy represents template class that provides implementation of policies composer to composite two policies. More...

 Provides composition of two policies.

Detailed Description

template<class PolicyOne, class PolicyTwo>
class mdragon::CompositePolicy< PolicyOne, PolicyTwo >

CompositePolicy represents template class that provides implementation of policies composer to composite two policies.

This template class have to be initialized by template parameters.

Parameters:
PolicyOne - first policy.
PolicyTwo - second policy.
